'''Catch the Wind''' was the first [[Battle Pass]] available upon release.

==Rewards==
===Sojourner's Battle Pass & Gnostic Hymn===
'''Sojourner's Battle Pass''' is the free Battle Pass for all players. '''Gnostic Hymn''' can be purchased for $10 USD and will unlock a second tier for this BP Period. Any player that purchases Gnostic Hymn will also get an extra reward at BP Lv. 30 where they can choose ''one'' of the '''4{{star}}''' weapons  from the current BP Bounty.

===Gnostic Chorus===
Costing around $20 USD (or $11.99 if you already purchased Gnostic Hymn), Gnostic Chorus offers the following:

*Contains all Gnostic Hymn rewards for the current period
*Advance BP Level by '''10'''
*"Travel Notes: Catch the Wind" [[namecard]] style
*{{Item|Fragile Resin|30|x=5}}
{{Namecard|Travel Notes: Catch the Wind}}

==Experience==
There are a total of 56 days in the Catch the Wind Battle Pass, counting from the start of the Battle Pass period. Players who unlocked Battle Pass after the period started will have less days to rack up BP EXP.

There is a weekly Battle Pass EXP cap of 10,000 EXP from Events, but the ones under "This BP Period" do not count towards the cap.

===This BP Period===
There are 3 permanent BP Period missions to complete for 6,000 EXP. These missions can only be completed once during the Battle Pass Period.

Events may also add limited-time BP EXP, but will no longer be available once the event ends. BP EXP from events do not count toward the 10,000 weekly limit.
{{Battle Pass Mission Table
|mission1 = Make a total of 50 [[wishes]]
|exp1     = 1,500
|mission2 = Use a total of 5,500 [[Original Resin]]
|exp2     = 2,250
|mission3 = Clear [[Spiral Abyss]] challenge 8-3
|exp3     = 2,250
}}

===Total Experience===
In Catch the Wind, you need 50,000 EXP to get to the highest level of the Battle Pass, BP Level 50.

From playing and completing all Daily Missions each day during the BP Period, you can get up to 36,120 EXP ( <math>645EXP \times 56 days </math>).

From playing and completing all Weekly Missions each week during the BP Period, you can get up to 38,160 EXP (<math>4,770EXP \times8 weeks</math>).

If all Battle Pass missions are completed, [Dailies+Weeklies+This BP Period], and ignoring event missions, you can obtain 80,280 EXP.
